name: Roger Clemens' MVP Baseball
overview: FEEL THE HEAT! Three-time Cy Young Award winner Roger "The Rocket" Clemens brings home the best in Super NES baseball action: - Realistic over-the-shoulder fielding - Full-season league play - Close up plays at the base - Player-controlled leading and stealing - Instant replay for the great plays - Strategy tips from the rocket himself The Rocket's on the mound... and you're up!
